title: Humanist-touch display grotesque
author: happyhipster

comments.content: Very close to [Circular LL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131734/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Circular) by Laurenz Brunner for Lineto
Yes, it was confusing me that the minor r had that rounded terminal, but I found out, that there obviously was an alternative r included in the glyphs. Thanks, it is the Circular Typeface.
